name: Hermi the Hermit
description:
This game has a sort of old fashion game feel to it.
Floating orb thingies are food, and fish too eventually!
Simply keep eating until you've filled up your space! (Level 8)
Once you start the game, you can look around using the mouse.
To move use the WASD keys (the usual), Space to jump, and Shift to sprint!
The objective is to get a high score to brag to your friends about, so here's a hint.....
Only the food increases your feed to make you grow, but there are other things that give points ... o.o
(the fishies, if you're big enough)
